title: Attempting to reconnect 1...2...3 Log in error!!
body: I cant log in and haven't been able to all day is anyone else having this problem and is there any fast fixes to this situation

replies.body: Most people are logging in fine. Failure to log in could be the result of IPv6 interfering. [Read this to temporarily disable it.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3) Note: It does not work for Windows 8; reply to this comment telling me that if you're on Windows 8.

Yes i am on windows 8. I've recently ran recovery and re downloaded lol. Now for some weird reason i keep getting  this error.

I've tried changing the adapter settings i just cant figure out what the problem is. Another game i play is having the same problem ever since i did the recovery.
I have also disabled IPv6 but still no change

You cannot use that tutorial I linked you to if you're on Windows 8. The checkbox will unclick, but it doesn't actually reflect the changes you've made, thus making it worthless. Did you do the method which involves editing the registry?
What internet you use? Flip, Telstra or Telecom by any chance?
